page.title: 14 OPINIONS/ROCKHAMPTON, cont.
page.content: viewed from the upper floors of most of the foremost properties.The local people find it not offensive and well landscaped and our opinion of it was that it looked quite stunning on a sunny day as it reflects on the white structure.The bus service in the area has been cut and this is substituted by more sensibly-sized minibuses run by the City's bus service and goes by the name "Badgerline", a new idea for '85. Even though this is available not many use it. Most of the people in the area being retired do a lot of gardening and maintaining of their houses whilst the ladies like to knit, read and listen to music. The community is very close-knit and the people of the area unite to help each other in cases of crisis. The people seemed bothered by the continual
